201: The resource has been successfully created.
400: The request was invalid. Please check the input and try again.
401: Please log in to access this resource or check your credentials and try again.
403: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
404: Oops! The requested resource could not be found. Please check your request and try again.
409: This action cannot be completed due to a conflict with the current state. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
429: Too many failed login attempts. Please wait for 1 minute before trying again.
500: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.
